name: Pink Onion
author: Evan W.
description:
A slice of heaven 
The reviews don't lie, this place is a gem.

I came in on a Wednesday and had no problem finding a seat. 

The small Tyson punch out was enough to feed two people. Prepare to have leftovers if you're ordering more than one. 

The ingredients are fresh and the family (family owned biz) is welcoming. For you by Italians!

I will come back and explore the menu. 

The beer and wine selection was great as was the ambience.
